email.subject: Field Trip Permission Form - Please Sign
email.body:
Dear Parents,

Please sign the attached permission form for our science museum field trip on October 25th. The cost is $15 per student. Forms must be returned by October 20th.

Thank you,
Mrs. Johnson

email.subject: Permission Form & Field Trip Fee - Action Required
email.body:
Dear Parents,

Two items require your immediate attention for the upcoming Museum of Natural History field trip:

1. PERMISSION FORM: Please sign the attached permission slip for your child to attend on November 12th.

2. FIELD TRIP FEE: $25.00 per student (covers admission + transportation)
   Pay online: https://lincolnelementary.edu/pay/fieldtrip2025

Both must be completed by November 5th.

Student: Alex Rodriguez - Grade 4
Teacher: Ms. Patterson

Thank you,
Lincoln Elementary Administration

email.subject: Schedule Your Annual Physical - Dr. Martinez
email.body:
Dear Patient,

It's time to schedule your annual physical examination with Dr. Martinez.

Please call us at (555) 123-4567 to schedule, or book online: https://valleymedical.com/schedule

Available times:
- Monday, Nov 4 at 2:00 PM
- Wednesday, Nov 6 at 10:30 AM
- Friday, Nov 8 at 3:00 PM

We look forward to seeing you!

Valley Medical Center

email.subject: We're sorry to see you go - Cancel Netflix
email.body:
Hi there,

We noticed you're considering canceling your Netflix subscription.

Your current plan: Premium ($22.99/month)
Next billing date: November 15, 2025

If you'd like to cancel, click here: https://www.netflix.com/cancelplan

We'd love to have you stay. Here's 50% off your next month if you keep your subscription.

The Netflix Team
